articles.title: KKK leader's wife admits to killing her husband
articles.description: After initially blaming her son for the 2017 murder, Malissa Ancona changes her story.
articles.content:
The wife of a deceased Ku Klux Klan leader has admitted in US court to his 2017 shooting death after initially saying her son was the murderer.
 Now, she says her son didn't help commit the homicide.
